property.name: insertDatabaseQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.blast_database ( database_id, name, path, reference_id, type, source ) VALUES ( :DATABASE_ID, :DATABASE_NAME, :DATABASE_PATH, :DATABASE_REFERENCE_ID, :DATABASE_TYPE, :DATABASE_SOURCE )

property.name: updateDatabaseQuery
property.value: UPDATE catgenome.blast_database SET name = :DATABASE_NAME, path = :DATABASE_PATH, reference_id = :DATABASE_REFERENCE_ID, type = :DATABASE_TYPE, source = :DATABASE_SOURCE WHERE database_id = :DATABASE_ID

property.name: loadDatabaseQuery
property.value: SELECT database_id, name as database_name, path as database_path, reference_id as database_reference_id, type as database_type, source as database_source FROM catgenome.blast_database WHERE database_id = ?

property.name: loadDatabasesQuery
property.value: SELECT database_id, name as database_name, path as database_path, reference_id as database_reference_id, type as database_type, source as database_source FROM catgenome.blast_database
